What can be done?

```{r, Operations-1}

# R as a calculator
sqrt(12)

y <- x^2
x+y

# Creating Vectors

v1
v2 <- 2:11
v2
a <- c(1,6,10,22,7,13)

3*(4 +
     +2)
#Assignments and Function Calls

t.b <- t.a + 2.5
mn <- mean(c(t.a,t.b))
mn
```
